data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freyhof, Jörg (2017): Re-description of Alburnus doriae, with comments on the taxonomic status of A. amirkabiri, A. mossulensis, A. sellal and Petroleuciscus esfahani (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 4323 (4): 487-502, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.4.3|17 occurrences
